mapper.insert: insert into t_car(id, carnum, brand, guide_price, produce_time, car_type) values (null, #{carNum}, #{brand}, #{guidePrice}, #{produceTime}, #{carType});
mapper.select: select id, carnum as carNum, brand, produce_time as produceTime, guide_price as guideMoney, car_type as carType from t_car where id=#{id};
